Name: The Cab
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.
Review: A minty limey cognac sour invigorated with champagne.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Andres Walters at The Lobo Plantation in Sydney, Australia.
